info.title: Azure SQL Database disaster recovery configurations
info.description: Provides create, read, update, delete, and failover functionality for Azure SQL Database disaster recovery configurations.

get.description: Lists a server's disaster recovery configuration.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for the request.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The subscription ID that identifies an Azure subscription.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group that contains the resource. You can obtain this value from the Azure Resource Manager API or the portal.

parameters.name: serverName
parameters.description: The name of the server.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for the request.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The subscription ID that identifies an Azure subscription.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group that contains the resource. You can obtain this value from the Azure Resource Manager API or the portal.

parameters.name: serverName
parameters.description: The name of the server.

parameters.name: disasterRecoveryConfigurationName
parameters.description: The name of the disaster recovery configuration.

put.description: Creates or updates a disaster recovery configuration.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for the request.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The subscription ID that identifies an Azure subscription.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group that contains the resource. You can obtain this value from the Azure Resource Manager API or the portal.

parameters.name: serverName
parameters.description: The name of the server.

parameters.name: disasterRecoveryConfigurationName
parameters.description: The name of the disaster recovery configuration to be created/updated.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for the request.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The subscription ID that identifies an Azure subscription.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group that contains the resource. You can obtain this value from the Azure Resource Manager API or the portal.

parameters.name: serverName
parameters.description: The name of the server.

parameters.name: disasterRecoveryConfigurationName
parameters.description: The name of the disaster recovery configuration to be deleted.

post.description: Fails over from the current primary server to this server.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for the request.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The subscription ID that identifies an Azure subscription.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group that contains the resource. You can obtain this value from the Azure Resource Manager API or the portal.

parameters.name: serverName
parameters.description: The name of the server.

parameters.name: disasterRecoveryConfigurationName
parameters.description: The name of the disaster recovery configuration to failover.

post.description: Fails over from the current primary server to this server. This operation might result in data loss.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for the request.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The subscription ID that identifies an Azure subscription.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group that contains the resource. You can obtain this value from the Azure Resource Manager API or the portal.

parameters.name: serverName
parameters.description: The name of the server.

parameters.name: disasterRecoveryConfigurationName
parameters.description: The name of the disaster recovery configuration to failover forcefully.

location.description: Location of the server that contains this disaster recovery configuration.

value.description: The list of disaster recovery configurations housed under the server.

DisasterRecoveryConfigurationListResult.description: Represents the response to a List disaster recovery configuration request.

autoFailover.description: Whether or not failover can be done automatically.

failoverPolicy.description: How aggressive the automatic failover should be.

partnerLogicalServerName.description: Logical name of the partner server.

role.description: The role of the current server in the disaster recovery configuration.

status.description: The status of the disaster recovery configuration.

DisasterRecoveryConfigurationProperties.description: Represents the properties of a disaster recovery configuration.

DisasterRecoveryConfigurationNameParamet.name: disasterRecoveryConfigName
DisasterRecoveryConfigurationNameParamet.description: The name of the disaster recovery configuration.
